articles.description: All the latest football news and Premier League reaction as Nottingham Forest win 3-0 at Wolves, plus the latest on Julen Lopetegui's future.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Forest win again to go pull clear of fourth & Lopetegui latest

articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur trigger an option to extend forward Son Heung-min's contract by a year, until the summer of 2026.
articles.title: Son Heung-min: Tottenham Hotspur trigger option to extend forward's contract until 2026

articles.description: When Nottingham Forest face Liverpool at the City Ground next week it will be a top-of-the-table match that barely anyone could have predicted back in August.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest v Liverpool: Are Nuno Espirito Santo's side Premier League title contenders?

articles.description: Novak Djokovic may be 37, but the 24-time Grand Slam champion can never be counted out as he aims to make more history in Melbourne.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic: Stefan Edberg and Billie Jean King on Serb's 2025

articles.description: Villarreal's academy has trained stars like Rodri, Nicolas Jackson, Pau Torres and current winger Alex Baena.
articles.title: Inside the Villarreal academy that produced Rodri, Nicolas Jackson and Alex Baena

articles.description: West Ham are considering whether to sack Julen Lopetegui following Saturday's heavy defeat at Manchester City.
articles.title: Julen Lopetegui: West Ham considering whether to sack Spaniard

articles.description: Britain's Cameron Norrie apologises after throwing his racquet and accidentally hitting a spectator during his loss to Facundo Diaz Acosta.
articles.title: Cameron Norrie apologises after thrown racquet hits spectator in Auckland

articles.description: The England and Wales Cricket Board calls for a unified response to action against Afghanistan amid calls for the England men's team to boycott next month's Champions Trophy match against the country.
articles.title: England-Afghanistan boycott calls: ECB want ICC-wide approach to Champions Trophy issue

articles.description: England appointed German Thomas Tuchel but there is no shortage of English-born coaches in charge of national teams across the globe.
articles.title: Meet the Englishmen managing national teams abroad

articles.description: BBC Sport explores why some Liverpool fans were hostile towards Trent Alexander-Arnold during Sunday's 2-2 draw with Manchester United at Anfield.
articles.title: Trent Alexander Arnold fan abuse: Could Real Madrid transfer speculation harm Liverpool?
